name: DeadForGood
description:
• basically it's a platformer ,  made for the Brackeys Game Jam around the theme "Rewind".
  • your main objective of the game is to make the player reach her hero ,who will be waiting at the end of your path .
  • if you die a ghost of the player will be created which you can use as a platform to hop on , and your game will be rewinded for 5 seconds .
  • You have 4 lives and use them carefully .
  • Sometimes Death is the only way out so don't get cozy on spending some lives .
  • Enjoy the game and try to reach your 'HERO'.

Download the zip file and you will find the executable game insite it , Thank you!
